channel.title: How do I add custom items to Galkon's Refactored client?
channel.description: I tried everything "I" could think of. I tried adding a class8 to it from one of my other clients, tried adding the models and get them to load....... but nothing works! anyone know how I can add them?

item.title: How do I add custom items to Galkon's Refactored client?
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Ints are different for every item.

If they are for you,(Renamed) they have
itemDef.
before every entry/line.

Non-renamed:
class8.
before every entry/line.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add custom items to Galkon's Refactored client?

item.title: How do I add custom items to Galkon's Refactored client?
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:3, topic:350441”]rofl fail. use a non-renamed client tbh.
HINT: ItemDef.java
(make sure ints sare renamed…)[/quote]ok thanks. you wouldn’t happen to know the ints for it?

Read full topic
